price: 18. (Les dijo:) “Entrégame a los siervos de Al-lah (del pueblo de Israel). Realmente, yo soy para ustedes un Mensajero digno de confianza.
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
